entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
